title: Did Arizona GOP Rep. Ask: " If the masks are working, why wasn't they needed in the AIDS crisis? '
subtitle: Joseph Chaplik met with fun after remarks while advocating a bill to exempt businesses in Arizona from disguised states.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Joseph Chaplik, President of the State of Arizona, opposed the effectiveness and necessity of facial masks by pointing out that mask states were not widely used to combat the spread of HIV.
